nodes.bodyText: Why aren't these else if statements?
Because the whole point of this is that more than one can apply.
No, because the string is modified before the next check.
Is this ever used or just assigned?
Did you actually look at the rest of the code?

I did, and saw it assigned and not used.
I did miss that it was a previously existing variable, hence the question.
It's used in a part of the code that wasn't modified for this PR. Hence my question about actually looking at the rest of the code.

I scan read, so I can miss stuff because of it.
However, I always take a look at the rest of the code when reviewing, to try to avoid dumb mistakes like this. My apologies on this one
